page.title: 04WILD FLOWERS
page.content: There are over 250 different species of wild flowers in this district alone.Woodlands,roadside verges,farm tracks and other uncultivated patches of land provide great scope for a wide variety of wild flowers,for example, {orchids,violets,cowslips,campanula, {solomon's seal,stemless thistles, {yellow bedstraw}and{herb robert,} amongst others. Alongside woodland tracks and in amongst the hedgerows a different selection of plants thrive _{primrose, {hellebore,helleborine,yellow vetch, {nipplewort,yarrow,dog rose,bugle, {heartsease}and{hogweed. Out in the open,cultivated fields and pastures,plants such as{agrimony, {scarlet pimpernel,bryony}and{burdock} grow.Here also are{dog mercury,wild {thyme,deadly nightshade,shepherd's {purse,poppy,celendine}and{scabious.
